About Me

Hello! I'm George Akor, a passionate Software Engineer and Graduate Researcher with a focus on AI and Smart Contracts. My journey in technology has been driven by a deep curiosity for how we can build more intelligent, efficient, and secure systems.

I specialize in Machine Learning, Full-Stack Web Development, and the emerging field of Smart Contract development. I love tackling complex problems, creating innovative solutions, and continuously learning. Feel free to explore my projects and get in touch!
